Content.Text: Cannot communicate with bags and stocks.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's start the exchange immediately.
Get the item ready!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm going to exchange the items. You
can't complain no matter what you get.

Your bag is full, so I put the exchanged
item in your tool box.

Your bag is full, so I put the exchanged
item in your storage.

Your bag is full, so I put the exchanged
item in your refrigerator.

Your bag is full, so I put the exchanged
item in your supply shed.

There is no place to store items, so you
couldn't receive the item you exchanged.
Be careful next time!

Your stock is full, so you couldn't
receive the design item you exchanged.
Be careful next time!

The farm owner you were communicating
with seems to have disappeared.  
You could not exchange the item.
